background.title: My Background
content: I'm a passionate web designer and developer based in Southampton, UK with over 8 years of experience creating beautiful, functional websites and applications.
After graduating with a degree in Computer Science, I worked with several agencies before deciding to focus on creating bespoke websites for clients who need a unique online presence.
I believe in clean, efficient code and thoughtful design that puts the user experience first. Every project I take on receives my full attention and dedication to quality.

approach.title: User-Centered Design
approach.content: I create websites with the end user in mind, focusing on intuitive navigation, accessibility, and engaging experiences.

approach.title: Modern Technologies
approach.content: I stay up-to-date with the latest web technologies and best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

approach.title: Collaborative Process
approach.content: I work closely with clients throughout the development process, ensuring their vision is realized at every step.
